title: Recipe Page
recipe_description: An easy and quick dish, perfect for any meal. This classic omelette combines beaten eggs cooked to perfection, optionally filled with your choice of cheese, vegetables, or meats.
optional_fillings_chees_text: Optional fillings: cheese, diced vegetables, cooked meats, herbs
beat_the_eggs_text: Beat the eggs: In a bowl, beat the eggs with a pinch of salt and pepper until they are well mixed. You can add a tablespoon of water or milk for a fluffier texture.
heat_the_pan_text: Heat the pan: Place a non-stick frying pan over medium heat and add butter or oil.
coock_the_omelette_text: Cook the omelette: Once the butter is melted and bubbling, pour in the eggs. Tilt the pan to ensure the eggs evenly coat the surface.
add_fillings_text: Add fillings (optional): When the eggs begin to set at the edges but are still slightly runny in the middle, sprinkle your chosen fillings over one half of the omelette.
fold_and_serve_text: Fold and serve: As the omelette continues to cook, carefully lift one edge and fold it over the fillings. Let it cook for another minute, then slide it onto a plate.
enjoy_serve_hot_text: Enjoy: Serve hot, with additional salt and pepper if needed.
the_table_shows_nutritional_values_text: The table below shows nutritional values per serving without the additional fillings.
